message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to offer $8500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand your desire to save as much as possible, Bob. However, I still believe the product's value is higher than your offer. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $9000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the value it will bring to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to offer $8750 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me and the value it will bring to you.

I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob. However, I'm getting closer to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9200. This is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the value it will bring to you.

I understand you're getting close to your minimum acceptable price, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to offer $8800 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me and the value it will bring to you.
